title: Lucian Prime Chroma is not working????
body: is this just a problem with me or is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Are you experiencing this in Team Builder, or any queue you're trying to enter?
Also it says lucian prime and automatically spawns me yellow but doesn't let me select which one i want.
Okay, gotcha. Thanks for the additional context. Lemme investigate a bit, and I'll get back to you!
i was in summoners rift normal. thank you for responding, haha.
